Name: Icelandic NER API
Description: This is a dockerized NER for Icelandic. The code for the API is available at GitHub. There are two models for this NER available for download through the CLARIN-IS repository; the ELECTRA-base model, which achieves F1-score of ~91.9 on the test set for MIM-GOLD-NER, and the Ensamble model, which uses a the IceBERT language model from Mi√∞eind as its primary model, but it also offers the possibility to use 3 other transformer language models with it ( ELECTRA-base, convbert-small, and multilingual-BERT) and combines them with CombiTagger.
